attributes.action: Demand Xi Jinping to close Uyghur concentration camps in the Xinjiang province.
attributes.additional_details: Xi Jinping and the Chinese Communist Party placed up to 3 million Uyghur Muslims in concentrations camps since 2017. Many detainees who fled China describe harsh conditions - Inmates are forced to renounce Islam. Prison-like conditions, with cameras and microphones monitoring inmates every move. Others said they were tortured and subjected to sleep deprivation and Women faced sexual abuse including rape, sterilisation and abortions. Others subject to medical experiments and much more.
attributes.background: Since 2017, Xi Jinping - General Secretary of the Communist Party of China has placed up to 3 million Uyghur Muslims in concentrations camps. This crime must come to an end. The world must act, and the UK must play it's part in liberating the Uyghur Muslims.
